name: Space Jumper (caevv)
description:
a small little jumping game made for the Mini Jam 24 (the theme was "space")

try to reach for the stars for some extra scores, but watch where you jump!

controls
left click to jump

limitations (jam constraint)
only mouse input

credits
made with: https://godotengine.org/
code: caevv
art: Mahlera & caevv
Godot logo (used as the base for the character sprite): Andrea Calabró
music: ozzed
sfx: sfxr
